name: Stunt Cycle
summary: Stunt Cycle is a 1 player (or 2 players alternating) arcade game by Atari Inc., originally released in 1976. The game is housed in a custom cabinet that includes a simulated motorcycle steering column mounted on the control panel. The monitor is a 19-inch black and white CRT monitor with a black and white overlay.
info:
• 开发: Atari
  • 发行: Atari
  • 平台: 街机
  • 游戏类型: SIM
  • 游玩人数: 1~2人
  • 发行日期: 1976年1月
